text: Sen. Ron Johnson walking onto the Senate floor today without a mask on: "I wear a mask when I go into grocery stores, that type of thing. I think around here we probably won't have to. They're not pleasant to wear, are they?" 😑 https://t.co/ffvolWfLkv
